channel.title: math.KT updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.KT updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Coarse Baum-Connes and warped cones: failure of surjectivity in odd degree
item.description: arXiv:2504.21811v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We prove a conjecture of Roe by constructing unified warped cones that violate the coarse Baum-Connes conjecture. Interestingly, the reason for this is probably not what Roe expected, as the obstruction arises in odd rather than even degree.
item.dc:creator: Christos Kitsios, Thomas Schick, Federico Vigolo

item.title: Gorenstein homological modules over tensor rings
item.description: arXiv:2504.21349v1 Announce Type: cross Abstract: For a tensor ring $T_R(M)$, under certain conditions, we characterize the Gorenstein projective modules over $T_R(M)$, and prove that a $T_R(M)$-module $(X,u)$ is Gorenstein projective if and only if $u$ is monomorphic and ${\rm coker}(u)$ is a Gorenstein projective $R$-module. Gorenstein injective (resp., flat) modules over $T_R(M)$ are also explicitly described. Moreover, we give a characterization for the coherence of $T_R(M)$. Some applications to trivial ring extensions and Morita context rings are given.
item.dc:creator: Zhenxing Di, Li Liang, Zhiqian Song, Guoliang Tang
